data.name: Howloween Hero
data.detailed_description:
OUR DISCORD


https://discord.com/invite/4mggTMq


About the Game


Howloween Hero is a sugary sweet trick-or-treat adventure where you run around town as a mischievous puppy on a mission to track down your owner's favorite candy. Meet a colorful cast of characters, unlock new outfits, and track down every last confectionery crumb in this wholesome Halloween adventure for players of all ages. But beware! Rumor has it, a menacing monster is on the prowl and sniffing around for their next victim...

Customize Your Hero

Purchase new costumes from the neighborhood dealer and mix & match parts to create your own unique style.

Collect Candy

Sniff out candy around the block, trick-or-treat nearby houses, and earn sweets by lending a paw to a cast of quirky kids.

Solve The Mystery

There's some strange stories going around about a REAL-LIFE monster stealing candy from unsuspecting kids. Is there any truth to these ghost stories or is everyone just getting into the spooky spirit?

data.short_description: A spooky trick-or-treat adventure about a mischievous puppy on a mission to score the evening's best candy. Create your costume, explore the neighborhood, and help your friends track down a menacing monster to save Halloween.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 / AMD Radeon R7 260X
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OSX 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.2GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible, 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OSX 12.00+
  • Processor: Apple M1 chip
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 chip
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
